1.content:
Becky, Missie and Cassandra, and their boyfriends, Rob, Louis and Alexander, were in Video Heaven at the South Field Mall, playing Rob's favorite game, Ultra Fighter. The boys were all expert players, having mastered the Xbox version long ago. The girls played just to keep the boys entertained. And how they were entertained!

"Louis, I beat Becky in 43 seconds!" Rob said.

"That's nothing, I knocked Missie out in 37!" Louis bragged.

"How are we supposed to get any better if you end the game so fast?" Cassandra complained. She folded her arms around her well-endowed bosom, forcing it out of her skimpy green top, and stamped her feet.

"You can start by picking better characters," Alexander explained to her. "Like Adam X, or Zor the Slasher. Not Betty Bosom or Sally Slut. They look good and all but they can't fight."

"I like Missy Muscles!" Missie piped up, clapping her hands and making her small breasts and her thin, soft arms jiggle. Missie was wearing a black tube top and no bra, leaving a lot of space to show off her bejewelled navel above her green shorts. "She has my name."

"She's actually not that bad a fighter, if you know how to use her skills," Louis admitted. "Although no girl could have muscles like she does."

“Yeah, and none of you guys will ever have muscles like Zor the Slasher either,” Becky countered. Becky wore a small, green, elastic gymnast top. .

"I have a muscle," Cassandra said, flexing her right biceps. A firm, surprising bump appeared on her upper arm, which she showed off by pushing back her short sleeves. Unlike the others, she wore a loose-fitting blouse but the generous size of her breasts still created tempting openings between the buttons.

Alexander felt Cassandra's bicep and resisted the strong temptation to squash it down He said, smiling, "Oh yeah! My great big amazon girlfriend!"

“Shut up, Alex,” Cassandra said quickly, but not angrily. She knew how he felt about her. “You know it’s pretty good for a girl!”

“Yeah,” Louis said. Then, on cue with Rob, “For a girl!” they added, laughing and wiggling their hips.

“Your friends are so immature!” Cassandra said to Alexander. “C’mon, girls. This is a mall. We should be shopping.”

“Did you see that cute top at Bargain or Bust?” Becky asked. Missie and Cassandra nodded. “Do you think it would fit me?”

“The green one with the pint, heart shaped buttons and the pink heart on each breast?” Missie said. Becky nodded.

“It might,” Cassandra answered. “You’re small enough. I could never wear it.”

“Don’t YOU complain about being too busty! I’d die for a figure like yours!” Becky said. She turned to Rob, whose attention was, not unusually, drawn to Cassandra’s chest. “And don’t you DARE say anything!”

“Hey, I’m just looking! What do you expect? With you girls talking about Cassie’s boobs, I just HAD to check ‘em out myself!”

“Yeah, give the guy a break,” Louis added as he looked as well until Missie firmly hooked her arm in his and pulled him around so he was facing her. “He’s only human.”

“Ooooooh! GUYS are SO disgusting!” Missie and Becky said, their voices rising in volume and tone. “Are we going?”

“I’m already gone,” Cassandra said.

Missie walked away from Louis. "What about you? Don't you want to see us model our new tops?"

"We'll see you later, after another game." Louis said.

The girls looked skywards and then walked to Bargain or Bust, which was at the other end of the mall from Video Heaven. They were inside for over an hour, with no sign of their boyfriends. After several purchases, they decided to try to find them.

"They're either still in the game room or in the food court," Missie said.

Oh look!” Becky said, pointing, when they were halfway back to Video Heaven. “What’s that?”

In the middle of the walkway was a huge green enamelled chamber that resembled an old fashioned boiler more then anything else. But it looked brand new, and the shiny paint on its surface dazzlingly reflected the mall’s overhead lights. Next to the machine was a poster showing a well-muscled strongman and below the poster were a series of dumbbells, the largest with a 100 kg disk on each end. Two attractive girls looked up admiringly at the strongman.

“What is it?” Missie said. “That thing wasn’t there when we walked by here before!”

“I don’t know,” said Becky, “Let's find out!”

The three teenage girls approached the contraption. A man next to it wore a loud plaid suit that was a little big for him. The sign attached to the device said:

THE BIG MEAN GREEN MUSCLE MACHINE!

On a placard next to the door by which the man stood was another sign. This one said:

"Grand Opening! Free Trials!" in large letters and "Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Satisfaction not guaranteed" in MUCH smaller print.

“Hmmm, they’re all dressed perfectly for the job!” he said to himself and then, more loudly, “Good afternoon, girls.” the man said as they approached. He was a skinny guy in his mid thirties, with a pockmarked complexion, about five feet, seven inches tall, so he was five inches taller then Becky, who was the shortest of the three sixteen year olds.

They stopped a short distance away, staring at him and the big boiler thing.

“Care for a free trial, young ladies?” he asked, unperturbed by their frank stares. “Your clothes are the perfect color for the Big Mean Green Muscle Machine!”

Becky moved a little closer to the machine and touched its side.

“What is this thing?” she asked.

“Why, it’s the most marvelous invention since the abdominizer!” said the man. “An invention that will revolutionize the entire workout-and-exercise business by standing it on its ear and then toppling it over! And you, my dear young lady, may just have the undisputed privilege of being the first one ever to use it!”

“M-me?” Becky stammered. “I don't know very much about exercising. I don’t even know what it does!”

“Why, it tones, it shapes, it builds and most of all, it STRENGTHENS!” the salesman said. “And all this in only a few short moments, without any effort and best of all, for a price that is not to be believed! In fact, the price for you today is SO small that it is ... non-existent.”

“Non-existent? You mean, free? But why give it away if your machine's so great?” Becky said, suspiciously.

“Because WE NEED ADVERTISING!” the man said. “And the best advertising, not to mention the cheapest, is by word of mouth! We are confident you and your friends will be so astounded by the results you attain that you will tell all of your friends about us!”

“Go ahead, Becky, try it!” Missie urged. “You’re always saying you're too skinny!”

“Yeah!” Cassandra said, giggling. “Go for it, girl! You could use a bit of strength. Give Rob a little surprise!”

“Will it hurt?” Becky asked.

"It won't hurt you in the slightest!"

"Will I get all sweaty?"

"You'll be fresher when you came out then when you went in!"

"Will it make me tired?"

“On the contrary! It will suffuse you with energy and well-being far beyond your expectations!” the man assured her.

"Is it safe?"

"Absolutely! I'd put my own mother in it, even my own sister!"

"Have you used it?" Cassandra interjected.

"No! Do I look like I did?"

The three girls looked at the salesman's unimpressive build.

"No! they all said at once.

"Well, why not?" Cassandra continued.

"Because I'm a salesman, not a guinea -- I mean, not a giant!" he replied. "Look are you interested? Time's running out!"

Becky hesitated and then nodded. “Well ... ok. What do I have to do?”

The man opened the door and motioned Becky forward. “Simply step inside, and then wait until I open the door again. The whole procedure will be over before you know it!”

Becky stood in front of the open door and peered into the chamber. It was all silvery, she could see her reflection in the curving walls and ceiling. Otherwise, the chamber was bare save for a few bumps running along the walls where they met the ceiling.

“Don’t be a chicken.” Missie said. “Get in there! We'll be right outside waiting.”

Becky hated being called a chicken, because her brother always told her she had skinny chicken legs. "Ok. But only if my friends go next!"

"Now that, little lady, is a DEAL!" the salesman said enthusiastically.

Becky took a deep breath, and went inside.

“Just a few moments and your whole life with change!” the man said, smiling and closing the door.

Missie and Cassandra moved closer to watch the man press a big yellow button next to the door and pull a lever down. The machine started humming.

“How long will ...?” Cassandra started to say, but was interrupted by a loud ding, like a large oven timer going off.

“Done!” the man said, opening the door with a flourish. “You may come out now, little girl.”

Becky stepped from the machine.

Missie and Cassandra gasped.

“Huh?” Becky said, stopping beside the man and looking down at his head. “Hey!” she said, "did you step in a hole or something?”

Smiling, he shook his head.

“Becky, you are soooo buff, girl!” Cassandra said.

“Huh? No I'm not,” Becky said, confused. "It's you guys who shrunk! You're, like, tiny!""

“Oh yeah? Why don't you look at yourself?” Missie chimed in. "You've got some new assets! You're a real babe!"

"A real buff babe!" Cassandra chimed in.

“What are you two talking about?” Becky said, putting her hands on her hips. "I'm not ... holy cow!” Becky said, looking down at her body. She raised her right fist, which she had unconsciously clenched, the result being a bulging bicep where only moments before had been a thin girl’s soft, muscle-free upper arm. Her top, which had previously fit tightly across her thin frame, had expanded too, and now fit very tightly across her muscular shoulders and newly endowed chest. The pink hearts on her new blouse, which she wore open over her green top, also had changed their appearance to appear three dimensional rather than flat, and appeared to beat whenever she moved. "Hey, I got real boobs too!"

"You sure do. Hey, I'd say you put Missy Muscles' bod to shame!" Cassandra said.

"Not for long!" Missie said, scrambling inside. Let 'er rip!" she said, as the man closed the door and started the sequence. Soon there was another loud ding and Missie emerged. She was three inches taller than Becky and even more muscular, with eight-pack muscles on her torso, biceps that bulged even without flexing and a tube top that revealed more breast flesh above and below the reinforced but still overmatched strip of fabric than it concealed.

"Missie, look at you!" Becky squealed. "You're like Supergirl!"

"Not bad!" Cassandra said, putting one leg inside the machine.

"I'm the REAL Missy Muscles now!" she said. "But what will Louis say?" she added, a concerned look appearing on her face.

"Hold that thought!" Cassandra replied. "First, I need to change my life. Are you ready, Mister?" she asked.

"As ready as you are!" he replied smartly.

"But Cassie, wait! If I'm this big, and Missie's even bigger, what'll happen to you?" Becky said in alarm.

"Yes, what will Alex say?" Missie added.

"I can't WAIT to find out!" Cassandra replied as the salesman shut the door. Moments later the ding sounded loudly and the door popped open. The girls waited anxiously, but no one came out.

"Cassie?" Missie said.

"Cassie, are you ok? CASSIE!" Becky said.

A long, thick muscular arm popped out of the door, followed by a long, thick muscular leg. Then a large head, bent to fit below the door frame and then, turned sideways, a bust so well-developed that she had to twist her body and ease out the door slowly to fit through.

"Heh, heh, heh," Cassandra boomed, straightening up to her new, 7 foot, seven inch height. Her blouse had expanded too, but had failed to completely match her growth and now fit snugly around her massive bust, while the loose long sleeves had changed into elastic short sleeves that seemed molded around her enormous biceps. She raised her right arm, flexed and looked happily at the mountain of muscle that quickly rose up.

"You're going to rip your shirt, Cassie!" Becky cautioned.

"I may, if I really try!" Cassandra replied.

"How come she got so big?!" Missie asked the man.

"I don't know! I'm a salesman, not a scientist!" he replied, quickly typing into his computer. "OK girls, I got work to do. You can run along now and do, er, do whatever girls do, like talk to your friends about The Big Mean Green Muscle Machine, right?"

"Look, it's the boys!" Becky said excitedly. She tucked her shopping bags under her arm and ran to meet them in large leaps, bowling over several in the crowd between them as though they weren't there.

Forty seconds earlier ....

"Do you think they'll be mad we were in there so long?" Louis asked.

"Hey, I haven't seen them come for us. That means they've been shopping even longer than we were playing," Rob replied.

"Hey, Rob. Look over at that leaping girl over there. She kind of looks like Becky, doesn't she? I mean, if they made a video game “super” version of Becky."

"She's way too big to be Becky, although I see what you --

"It IS Becky!" Alexander said. "But what about --

"Rob! I can't WAIT to show you what I got!" Becky said enthusiastically, interrupting Alexander. Her purchases dangled on one arm while she lifted Rob up with the other and pulled him against her, drowning his mouth in kisses. "Do you like my new top? Look at me!" She said, pulling back slightly after satisfying her immediate needs.

"H-hey, Becky. Easy! What happened to you?" Rob said, trying to make her put him down, his body compressing wherever Becky hugged him as he struggled helplessly against Becky's far superior strength.

"Oooh, you better stop tickling me!" Becky laughed, interpreting the frantic pushing of Rob's arm against her stomach as a playful tickle.

"I'm not --" Looking at the large bulge in Becky's upper arm Rob decided suddenly not to tell her he had been punching her with all his strength. "What the hell's happened to you?" he said, instead.

"We had a free treatment at the Big Mean Green Muscle Machine!" she said enthusiastically. "Come and look!" She bounced away, carrying Rob effortlessly through the gaping mall crowd, as though he were her toddler nephew instead of a boyfriend just a few inches shorter than she was, although now far less muscular.

Louis looked at Alexander. "We'd better follow them and see what's going on!" he said. Alexander nodded vigorously.

They found Becky standing next to Missie and Cassandra, each of whom stood much taller than the rest of the crowd that was looking up admiringly at the voluptuous and spectacularly well-developed teens.

"Louis! How'd you find us?" Missie squealed, pushing into the crowd. She grabbed her boyfriend and lifted him much as Becky had lifted Rob, although Louis, who was about the same height as Rob, looked even smaller next to Missie than Rob did next to Becky. His legs looked like matchsticks next to Missie's and they were so much shorter than hers that his feet rested only against her knees.

"Cut it out, Mi --" he gasped as she crushed the breath out of him with her affectionate hug.

"Louis! What's the matter? You're not getting embarrassed by a little public display of affection? I thought we were past the 'No-PDA' stage!" she said with a small pout, successfully disguising her anxiety about his reaction. She lifted him higher so that his head was at the same level as hers and she could look at him eye-to-eye. As she expected, this made him even more uncomfortable so that he looked away, downwards, only to have his attention caught like a fly in a web by the sight of Missie's overflowing breasts and the yawning cleavage between them. Seeing he was more interested in her larger breasts than in her much larger muscles, she relaxed, slightly and, more gently, cuddled him closer to her.

Meanwhile Alexander was staring raptly at Cassandra, who stood head, shoulders and breasts above the crowd. She stretched to the left and then to the right, testing her sense of balance in her changed physique and enjoying the way her mysteriously transformed clothing expanded to accommodate the expansion of her muscles as she tensed them. She could see Alexander watching her and his appreciation of her made her extend her exercises even longer. She knew what he liked, and now she had more of it than she had ever dreamed possible. She extended her long right arm and slowly flexed her bicep, higher and higher. The crowd whistled and hooted, which seemed to make Alexander nervous and uncomfortable, so Cassandra decided it was time to show him she was still his girl. She walked forward, and the crowd parted in front of her, out of a mixture of fear, respect and awe, until she stood directly in front of him. He craned his head upwards, but could not see her face -- her mammoth breasts blocked his view.

“Cassie ...” he said, his mouth dry with amazement.

“My lovely little boy!” she replied, lifting him easily and perching him on her hip, holding him up with one hand as she would a two year old. She kissed him deeply and thrilled as he wrapped his arms around her, his hands caressed her muscles, probing them and outlining them, seeking the measure of her size and strength, of the amazon she had become. She wanted him to do more, but she was still aware they were in the middle of the South Field Mall, with a crowd watching them. And the sounds of her friend brought that home even more strongly.

“But how’d you get so big? And look at Cassie over there. She’s like the Hulk!” Rob was saying.

“She is not! She’s not green or angry. And she is so beautiful! Not anything like the Hulk!” she said, correcting him.

“You’re not answering my question!” Rob insisted.

“Yeah, what happened to you? You only were gone for, like 2 hours!” Louis added.

“Not that long!” Missie said, correcting him and squeezing him more tightly against her bosom.

“STILL!” Rob said. “How’d you get these muscles?”

“These things?” Becky asked, smiling, flexing her arm and producing biceps that were at least 8” larger than her boyfriend’s. “Why, at the Big Mean Green Muscle Machine!”

“The WHAT?” Louis shouted.

“That’s CRAZY!” Rob exclaimed.

“It’s WONDERFUL!” Alexander whispered in Cassandra’s ear.

“There’s no such thing!” Rob added.

“Sure there is. It’s right over there!” the girls said in unison. “And it was free!”

“Well, then we have to use it too!” Rob said.

“Yeah, you're girls! It's not right for you to be stronger than us!” Louis added.

“You don’t mind, do you?” Cassandra said, licking Alexander’s ear with her long, powerful tongue.

“I LOVE your muscles,” Alexander replied, signing, and snuggling closer against her.

“Do you want to get stronger too, like me?” Cassandra asked, breathing heavily, her face red.

“Nahh. As far as I'm concerned you can have all the muscle for both of us,” Alexander replied, his erection pulsing insistently against Cassandra’s abdominals, his hand fondling her flexing biceps.

“Oh Alexander! That's exactly how I feel too! I love you!” she sighed.

Louis and Rob scrambled to get out of their girlfriends’ arms, and reluctantly Becky and Missie let them slide to the ground. The boys ran as quickly as they could to the green chamber.

"Grand Opening! Special Price!! $1 per unit!" in large letters and "Offer may be withdrawn at any time. Satisfaction not guaranteed" in MUCH smaller print.

“Oh!” Louis said, slightly disappointed. “I thought it was free,” he complained.

“It’s the Grand Opening. It’s still a bargain. And it may not last,” the salesman said, his eyebrows rising and falling with his words. “You won’t find a better deal anywhere. Think about the cost of a health club membership. Or a deluxe multi-gym exercise machine. Or a swimming pool. Nothing but The Big Green Mean Muscle Machine can promise such comprehensive, rapid and painless development. Just look at those well-developed and very beautiful girls. Don’t you think YOU deserve to have muscles like theirs?”

“But how much muscle will that get us?” Rob persisted.

The noise of the crowd increased as the line grew behind them.

“A unit’s a unit. Look, do you want to use it, or not? ‘Cause I got lots of customers out here. You’re wasting my time and costing me money. Who’s next?”

She turned and smirked at Rob and Louis and disappeared inside.

"She'll be even more of a dog if she gets muscles," Louis whispered back.

A loud ding sounded and the door opened. Sharon stepped out. The fat around her waist had vanished, replaced by rock-hard abdominals, larger and firmer breasts and a bubble butt. Rob and Louis looked up in amazement as they were padded on the head by the ripped giant towering over them: Sharon. Only moments ago this girl was chubby, insecure and much shorter than they were. They were both speechless.

“Who do you call a loser now?” Sharon said as she placed her hands on her hips, pushing her chest out and making her body look even bigger. Her larger breasts pushed against the skin-tight fabric of her shirt. She looked amazing. “As far as I can see, there are only two losers here now, and they’re both standing before me!”

Rob looked at his buddy Louis before tilting his head back to look up at Sharon. “Well, that’s about to change!” He shifted his focus to his buddy again. “Come on Louis, let’s grow!”

Both boys tried to get passed Sharon, but she managed to stop them from going any further. Her rippling arms, bigger than both boys’ combined, acted as large barriers. She spread both her fingers out on their chests as she held them back. “Not so fast…”

Rob and Louis looked down at the arms stopping them. Then they looked up at Sharon’s face, who grew a small grin.

“What the…?!?” Louis blurted out. He started pushing harder, but couldn’t get through. Sharon started laughing.

“Is that all you’ve got?”

Rob, who saw what his buddy was doing, started pushing harder as well. Even though he was slightly stronger and more athletic than his buddy, he too couldn’t get Sharon’s arm to bend. Her strength was just too strong.

Sharon, now noticing Rob was trying to get loose, starting laughing even harder. She couldn’t imagine she would ever be able to stop two full-grown teenage men. She was stronger than she thought.

“Oh just stop it”, she yelled at both struggling boys, “I just wanted to see how strong you were!”

The boys calmed down, almost out of breath.

“Well, apparently not strong enough…” Rob sighed as he looked at Louis who looked just as beaten as he did. Then he felt a strong grip around his upper arm. He looked up and saw Sharon squeezing his arm with a lot of force.

“Oh come on, this looks like nothing. Flex it! Please!”

Rob didn’t want to. He tried to free himself from Sharon’s grip, but soon realized it being useless.

“Flex! Don’t make me do it…” Sharon said as she squeezed a little harder. It hurt, yet Sharon wasn’t even squeezing hard.

“Ok, ok, stop! Stop! I’ll do it…!” Rob reluctantly agreed.

Sharon loosened her grip as Rob started rolling up his sleeve. Then he raised his arm and bent it as hard as he could. His hand rolled up into a fist as his biceps popped up into action. It was quite impressive for a teenage athlete, but to Sharon it looked pathetic. Her smile grew into a loud laughter.

“Is that it? Is that all you’ve got?” she yelled as she squeezed the biceps back into his arm. It hurt like hell. Then she raised her own arm and flexed it straight into Rob’s face. “THIS is what I call an arm!”

Both Sharon and Rob look up as they hear the familiar ping from the Big Mean Green Muscle Machine. Sharon slowly lowers her arm as she sees the salesman counting out a big packet of money; it must have been at least 80 dollars, all in 1 dollar bills. Who could have paid with so much money?

Rob looks around. He sees Becky, Missie and Cassandra approach from the other side of the hall and a large line full of enthusiastic people wanting to try out the machine. Then he turns his head to the other side of Sharon. He looks again. Back to the line of people, but his best buddy is nowhere to be found. “Uhm…where is Louis?!?” he remarks as he slowly turns his head to the door of the machine which is gradually opening with a hiss.

Steam escapes the small room of the machine as everybody looks on with curiosity into the pit black darkness. “WOW!” a dark baritone voice yells out of the chamber. Then a hand appears that finds grip on the frame around the door. Its fingers are huge in comparison to any other person seen coming out of the machine. A second hand appears on the opposite side.

Next, Louis’ head sticks out of the machine. An evil grin covers his face. His long blonde hair frames his head and gives him a sexy Adonis look. His face looks different, only slightly, but it is obvious that his facial features are more chiseled.

Everyone looks on as Louis slowly reveals himself. His head is attached to a much thicker neck; traps flaring out to his wide shoulders, which in turn have extremely ripped and thick arms attached to them. A large bulge in the front of his tights makes the girls in the audience swoon and the guys in the audience fill with jealousy. Two sets of massive, tree trunk thighs flare out the bottom of the low-cut leotard. His inner thighs touch as his feet stand firmly, yet separated, on the ground.

As he reached his full new height, Louis stands a whopping 7 feet; not bigger than Cassandra, but considerably bigger than Missie, Becky and Sharon. He takes a deep breath, pushing his chest forward and making his stance even bigger, as he scans the surroundings.

“Ah, that feels nice!” his low baritone voice booms through the mall. He raises an arm and flexes it as hard as he can. An enormous ball of pure muscle blows up in his arm as everyone looks on.

He then sees his buddy Rob standing next to the massive Sharon. She looks big in comparison to the skinny Rob, but as the now enormous Louis approaches he notices that he now looks down at her.

“So…we were talking about losers, weren’t we?!?” he booms through the hall as he once again pushes his chest forward. Sharon could only look up at Louis and gulp.

Louis grabbed the side of Sharon’s arm and pulled to force her arm up. “Could you be so kind as to flex for me one more time?!?” he nicely asked.

Sharon, already a bit scared of the hulk towering over her, reluctantly agreed and started flexing her arm as hard as she could. The biceps once again grew and grew into a perfectly shaped ball of muscle the size of a softball; not often seen in a woman.

Louis laughed as he looked at the, in his eyes pathetic, arm the little Amazon was showing. Just as Sharon had done before on Rob’s arm, Louis opened his hand and placed his index finger on the top of her biceps and his thumb on her triceps. His hand was big enough to do this. Then he started to squeeze. Lightly at first, but harder and harder in the end. Sharon felt the pressure in Louis’ fingers building, pushing down into her skin and onto her hard muscles. It took several seconds before it started to hurt; tears rolled out of her eyes instantly.

“Stop! Please…you’re hurting me!”

Louis stopped squeezing harder, but he did not yet let go.

“I’m sorry? Am I hurting you? Is this loser hurting you?!?”

“Yes, ouch, you are! I’m sorry…”

“I can’t hear you…?!? Why did you do the exact same thing to my buddy and me…?!?”

“Ouch…I don’t know…I’m sorry…it will not happen again…”

As he heard Sharon saying that phrase, he let go of her arm completely.

“Good! That’s more like it! Now go, and don’t show your face around me or my friends again…or I know where to find you!”

Sharon, wiping the tears from her eyes and stroking the soreness in her upper arm, turned around and walked away…fast.

“Good riddance…!” Louis said to himself as he turned around to face his friend. But before he could turn around completely he was jumped by his girlfriend Missie. She hugged and kissed him, apparently she was happy with his transformation. Having her muscular body pressed against him felt really nice.

As Missie let herself down, Louis noticed he was bigger than her; he had to look down into her eyes.

“Oh baby! You’ve scared away Sharon! That bitch…she was always bullying us! Thanks!”

“Oh…you’re welcome…I guess!” Louis said a bit flabbergasted. “So…you don’t mind me having used the machine?!?”

Missie looked up at Louis’ face and padded his big pecs. “Nope, not at all! I like me some muscle on my man!” Then she jumped up and kissed him again.

“Hey, sorry to bother you…”, a familiar voice said as Missie and Louis broke their kiss, “…but have you seen Rob?”

The voice came from Becky, who looked really small compared to Louis now. Just behind her Louis saw the still small Alexander holding hands with his huge Amazon Cassandra.

“Oh hey guys!”

“Couldn’t resist the machine either…?” Alexander asked.

Louis laughed. “Nope, you should really try it as well…it’s great to be this big!”

“Maybe later!” Alexander replied, looking up lovingly at his Cassandra.

“But Rob should be around here somewhere…”, Louis told Becky. “He was just here a moment ago!”
111111.title: Louis the Hulk

choices: The group turns towards Alexander, the only one not grown yet
Meanwhile outside the mall
1111111.content:
Everyone in the group turned towards the door of the chamber when the loud bell pinged through the atrium.

“You don’t think Rob’s in there…do you guys?” Becky asked with a bit of disappointment in her voice. She kind of liked being bigger than her boyfriend and didn’t want him to become bigger than her.

“I don’t know…” Louie said, looking concerned at Becky. “But he’s nowhere else to find!”

The door hissed open as steam escaped the narrow cracks. Everyone in the group, as well as the people standing in line, were curious to see what the next person would look like as he or she stepped out of the chamber.

Through the cloud of smoke a thick, hairy leg positioned itself on the ground in front of the chamber. It was a man. The remainders of his Converse All Stars were still hanging loosely over the top of his foot, but the rest of the shoe had been torn open from the growing foot inside.

Thick, hairy calves led up to massive thighs that had ripped open the person’s jeans completely. Tatters of jean fabric were draped over his upper legs as it had burst through the seams inside the chamber. The leg, though impressive to the average sized audience, was smaller in size than Louie’s or Cassandra’s.

The smoke cleared, slowly revealing more and more of the man’s body as he climbed out of the chamber. His crotch was still concealed inside the remainder of his jeans and stretched-out underpants, but by the looks of it it was enhanced as well.

Next, a rippling washboard stomach revealed itself not much unlike those fitness models in the magazines. It wasn’t a bodybuilder sized upper body as Louie now possessed but more a gymnast/swimmer/fitness model type. A thick, dark haired, treasure trail ran in between the guy’s individual abs, from the waistband of his underwear all the way to his navel.

His chest, which was now easy to see as all the smoke had vanished, was also covered in a light set of dark fur; not too much, but just right to be considered sexy by many ladies. His rather small nipples in comparison to his chest size, were positioned perfectly centered on each individual pec, slightly pointing down. The shape of his pecs was perfectly squared, with a definite crevice in between each muscle.

Shreds of his dark blue shirt hung loosely over his broad shoulders as the guy’s face was still obstructed by his gaze pointing down. He was overwhelmed by the sensation of his transformation and surprised of the results that he inspected his new body instantly.

Becky looked the guy up and down, and couldn’t help but spot the distinctive moles and scars that distinguished her boyfriend from all the other guys in the mall; it was Rob!

Just at that moment, the guy looked up and scanned the atrium for his best friends. As soon as he spotted them all staring with their mouths open at him, a smile grew on his face. Filled with confidence and pride he raised both his arms and flexed a double biceps for his friends and all the girls and gays in the audience.

Becky fell in love all over again. Although she hated the idea of her boyfriend becoming more muscular at first; she now liked what she saw.

As the salesman behind Rob began inviting the next participant into the machine, Becky ran towards Rob’s arms. He held them wide open for his girlfriend to jump into. Becky did, and the two of them made one of their most passionate kisses up to date.

“Oh honey…” Becky said as she hang onto Rob’s ripped torso, her legs wrapped around him.

“Do you like it?” Rob asked.

“Like it? I love it!” she said as she planted another kiss.

The rest of the group approached to congratulate Rob on his transformation, when Becky let herself down again. To her biggest surprise, one that she would be thankful for forever, she slightly towered over her boyfriend; apparently he hadn’t grown much in height, only in muscle.

“Oh honey…I’m still bigger…”

“Yeah, I know. I don’t mind! I had to choose between muscle and height with the small amount of cash I had on me…and I think I chose wisely…didn’t I?” Rob explained, comically flexing his chest.

“I love you!!!!” Becky concluded with another kiss.
1111111.title: Rob couldn't wait to try it out

choices: He bumped into the Big Mean Green Muscle Machine
He bumped into Alexander
11111112.content:
Right outside the mall the 15-year-old boys and friends since kindergarten Jake and Dylan meet up. They have planned to go check out the latest PS3 game, but they’re not sure if it’s already available as the official release isn’t until the next morning. Nevertheless they have decided to go take a look.

As they approach one of the entrances to the mall, they spot Mike and his gang. Mike is the 16-year-old bully at Jake and Dylan’s school; even though he’s a year older he’s in the same class as the boys. Mike’s the size of a tank: at 6ft2 he towers over most guys at school and his 210lbs of flabby fat certainly gives him an impressive physique.

“Dude!” Jake pokes Dylan in his side. “There’s Mike…right next to the entrance…”

Dylan, rubbing his side from the soreness Jake’s poke gave him, replied curious: “So?”

“What so? Don’t you remember what he did to us last time?”

“Did to YOU last time…”

Jake gave his friend the evil eye. “Fine, what he did to me…but I sure as hell don’t want to go through that again. I still smell like fish every now and then…” referring to the afternoon Mike had thrown Jake into the dumpster behind the school’s cafeteria on the day they had to throw away expired fish.

“Oh come on…don’t be a sissy! Just ignore him; we’ll go straight passed him into the mall…” Dylan said as he took Jake’s arm to pull him along.

“NO!” Jake yelled a little bit too loud. One of the boys from Mike’s gang looked up towards the two kids; poking Mike as he knew this could be fun. Mike looked up as well and smirked as he spotted his next two victims.

“Oh crap! Run Dylan! Run!” Jake yelled as he noticed Mike was coming after them. But it was already too late; two slim guys from Mike’s posse, who ran track, intercepted both boys within seconds, keeping them in a headlock until Mike arrived.

“Well, well, well…who do we have here…” Mike said very condescending. “If it isn’t the little fish-boy and his best buddy, mister Crapmypants. What are you two morons doing on my turf?”

“We just wanted to check out Eternal Fires of Hell 3…”

“Ah, a video game!” Mike responded laughing out loud. “Of course, I could have known…these two nerds are only here for a video game…”

“Please Mike, just let us go…don’t hurt us!”

“I’m sorry? It seems like fish-boy wants to say something…” Mike put his ear closer to Jake’s head, which was still locked between the other guy’s arm.

“Just let us go…please…what have we done to you to deserve this?!”

“Ah, so trespassing on my terrain doesn’t require punishment you say…?”

“How can a mall be your terrain; it’s public terrain!” Dylan intervened.

“Ah, but that’s where you’re wrong! The Mall is owned by the Mastersons Corporation…and I happen to have the surname Mastersons…my dad owns this joint; so I own it as well, giving me the perfect right to sue you for trespassing!”

“Just tell us what you want from us and let us go…” Jake asked hoping the punishment would be light.

“Hmm…well, alright, I don’t want to spend my entire free afternoon keeping you guys company anyway.” Mike pondered on a suitable punishment. “Tell you what; as of this day, I charge a toll for entering my family’s shopping mall…at the exact price of what you dweebs have in your wallets right now!”

Mike puts his hand inside Jake’s pocket and pulls out his wallet; emptying it out on the concrete street. Next he does the same thing with Dylan’s wallet.

“So the penalty is exactly $125…” Mike counts the spread out bills and coins on the floor.

Jake starts to wrestle free. “That’s not fair! That’s OUR money! Give it back!!!”

Mike points at the coins on the floor. “That money now touches my family’s property…so it’s MY money now!” He chuckles loudly, followed by others in his gang following suit.

“You don’t have the right to take it! It’s our money…you’re stealing!” Dylan shouts as he too tries to get loose from the big guy holding him.

Mike, who sits on one knee in front of the two boys picking up the money, looks up at Dylan and smiles. “So…? What are you gonna do about it…?”

Then Dylan did something unexpected; something bold and brave that left Jake’s mouth wide open. Dylan scraped his throat, collected a decent amount of saliva and spit it right into Mike’s face.

The bully doesn’t know what happened; he grabs his eyes and starts rubbing them clean as the saliva slowly rolls down his cheeks.

At the exact same time as Dylan spit, he managed to head-bud the guy who was holding him; breaking himself free within seconds. The guy holding Jake looks up but before he can react, Dylan kicks him straight in the nuts. He drops Jake to the floor who quickly gets up to follow Dylan, grabbing a large part of the money as he goes.

The two boys run as fast as they can away from the group, into the large shopping mall.

Mike, stilling rubbing the spit from his eyes, shouts at the rest of his gang to follow the boys and kill them! They were all surprised by the sudden turn of events that they hadn’t reacted on getting the boys.

Meanwhile inside the mall the boys run like the wind; whizzing past non-suspecting shoppers. They have to get as far away from the gang as possible.

“Shit man, what was that?!?” Jake shouts towards Dylan as they flee.

“I don’t know! I don’t know what came over me…” Dylan answers back as he turns to look if they are following them. “Oh crap, we’ve got company!”

All six of the guys from Mike’s gang, including Mike himself, stormed through the mall, pushing everyone away who’s on their path. A small girl starts crying as Mike pushes her to the ground; angry parents want to do something, but Mike just ignores them. He is only focused on one thing: Jake and Dylan.

The boys turn a corner, out of sight of Mike, giving them some safety.

“Man, he looks furious!” Jake tells Dylan as they still run away.

“Yeah, but wouldn’t you be if you’ve just got spit in the face…?” he grinned.

“True!” Jake smiled back.

The boys reached the large atrium. Luckily for them, it was filled with people. They decided it was probably best to mix with the crowd, making them invisible for Mike.

As they are halfway through the atrium, walking in a slow pace now, they both look back to see if there’s any sign of Mike. Just at that moment, Mike turns a corner on the other side of the hall and looks even angrier than before. He starts meticulously scanning the area.

“Oh shit; we need to do something…fast!” Dylan told his buddy as he was about to take another step. But he couldn’t; he bumped into something…something hard…
11111112.title: Jake and Dylan

choices: The boys have grown evenly and are now much bigger than Mike
One of the boys is Mike’s size, the other is way bigger
111111121.content:
“Are you alright there, buddy?” Jake asks his friend as he padded him on the shoulder. “Better watch out where you’re going next time!”

“Ha ha, very funny!” Dylan said a bit irritated, rubbing his nose from the pain. “What the hell is this and what is it doing in the middle of the mall?” he said as he took a few steps back to inspect the large machine he bumped into.

“I…I don’t know…”, Jake told him, “but we’d better not stand still for too long…” Jake nodded his head to the side, pointing towards Mike and his gang who was slowly coming closer.

“Oh crap!” Dylan yelled as he saw what his buddy was hinting at. The two boys walked around the machine, trying to use it as a shield behind which they could hide. Mike had not yet noticed them, luckily, but he was walking in their direction.

As the boys reached the other side of the machine, they accidentally bumped into the smooth talking salesman who was about to go enjoy his much needed lunch break.

“What you boys doing here?” he kindly asked.

Both Jake and Dylan jumped up after hearing the salesman’s voice; they thought it would be one of Mike’s boys.

“My my, are you jumpy…!?” the salesman added.

Dylan, checking for Mike who was within 20 feet, quickly explained the situation to the, to them, unknown man: “Oh sorry sir, it’s just that we are hiding from a bully who we assaulted…and now he’s after us!”

“Ah, I see.” the salesman reacted genially interested. “And who might this so-called ‘bully’ be, if I may be so blunt to ask?”

Jake pointed towards Mike, who was now within 15 feet and acted like a hunter looking for his prey. It was almost as if he could smell the fear in the two boys.

Dylan and Jake lowered their heads even further, hoping for Mike or his buddies not to spot them. The salesman tilted his entire body to the side so he could see past the machine.

“Is it the big fat one with the groupies following him?” he asked.

The boys nodded in unison, trying to be as quiet as possible. The salesman saw the fear in their eyes.

“You know what…I might be able to help you!” the salesman continued. “Why don’t you hide in here until the bully is gone…” he proposed pointing at the door of the chamber that was part of the machine. “I’ll make sure he doesn’t find you in here!”

Jake and Dylan looked at each other before looking back at the salesman. Could they trust him? But what could happen anyways? He was kind enough to help out! The saw in each other’s eyes they agreed on the proposal and slowly crawled towards the door.

They had to be careful as Mike was coming really close and they had to crawl in his eyesight. The salesman opened the door to the chamber and stood in between Mike and the boys; blocking the direct view on the victims.

“I’m sorry it’s a bit cramp with two of you inside, but it could be worse…” the salesman whispered as he closed the door. As the boys hear the lock of the door shut, they look around the metal chamber that was illuminated only by a flickering light bulb. It wasn’t half as bad as the salesman made it look; they had enough room to stand up freely, even move around a little. The boys, however, decided it was best to stay as quiet as possible as they could hear Mike approaching the salesman on the outside.

“How can I help you sir?” the salesman asked Mike as oblivious as possible.

“Who’s inside that chamber?” Mike yelled at the salesman as he was probably on to something.

“No-one sire, I was just closing it down to go out for lunch…”

“Nonsense!” Mike yells as he pushes his chest out towards the salesman. “I just saw someone enter that chamber right before you closed it! Now tell me how that was!”

“You must have seen things…”, the salesman tried to lie, “…there is absolutely no-one inside, I swear!”

“Then open it!”

“I…I can’t! It’s already powered down…I…”

“I said: OPEN IT!” Mike yells even louder as the boys inside hear a body being thrown against the metal casing of the machine. Just as the boys gasp for air as silently as possible, the light bulb starts to glow brighter and brighter.

“What the…” is all Jake could let out before his entire vision turns white.

Outside, the salesman is still fighting off the angry bully who is certain he saw someone enter the machine. When Mike pushed the salesman against the machine to demand him to open it, the salesman had accidentally smashed into and activated the control panel. The machine started humming and flashing, much to the enjoyment of the salesman.

Mike grabbed the guy by his collar and lifted him into the air against the side of the machine. “What the hell is happening?!? Tell me!!”

The salesman could only grin as the atrium was once again filled with the loud “ping” of the machine…
111111121.title: Hiding place

choices: Dylan and the salesman want to beat Mike up some more
One of Mike’s buddies tries to rescue his friend
1111111212.content:
The machine stopped humming and flashing right after the loud “ping” was heard echoing through the mall. Mike was still holding the grinning salesman against the side of the machine, unknown of what it could do.

“Damn it! Stop smiling! Tell me what the hell this machine is capable of!”

But the salesman didn’t answer. He didn’t have to, as the large door sealing of the chamber opened with a loud hiss. Smoke escaped as soon as a small opening was formed.

Mike threw the salesman to the side and grabbed the door to fully open it. He couldn’t see much through the thick smoke, but was surprised when a near-naked body came stepping out. He took a few steps back as he tried to identify the person. It looked about the same size as Mike himself; only it became quickly apparent that the shirtless upper body was filled with muscles beyond believe instead of the flabby fat Mike possessed.

Pieces of ripped off fabric draped the naked torso, while a yellow boxer brief covered the most private parts. His legs, which looked like they belonged to a cyclist, slowly adjusted to the new weight they were supposed to support. His chest expanded with every single breath of fresh air and his arms were raised up to support his forward hanging head. This made it difficult for Mike to identify the guy; who looked to be around 25 years old.

“Aw, my head hurts!” the guy spoke for the first time as he rubbed his forehead. He squinted his eyes as he took in the bright light of the atrium in the afternoon sun; needing some time to adjust to the new circumstances.

Mike, trying his best to identify the guy, looked towards the salesman who was trying to get up again. The salesman could only smile from ear to ear. Next, he looked at the guy again. Somewhere, in his face, there was something familiar. But he couldn’t quite place it; there weren’t many 25-year-olds he knew.

Dylan, the first of the guys to come out, was now getting his vision back to normal and almost fell backwards as he looked down at his own body. “What the hell…?!?” He inspected every new inch of his physique and quickly realized what the machine had done to him. He was bigger, stronger and more muscular than before! With such a body he could certainly take on Mike! A grin quickly grew into a smile, which in turn grew into loud laughter.

Dylan looked around the atrium and saw only a small group of people watch on in amazement as he had exited the machine. The rest of the people were busy shopping or talking to each other to notice anything.

As he was about to look to the left, he felt a strong arm grab him by the waist, trying to shove him to the side and fall over. It caught Dylan by surprise, which made him fall. As he looked up, he saw Mike staring back into his eyes, looking very crossed. He had just been sucker punched by his former bully.

“Dylan you fucker! I don’t know what kind of sick games you are playing, but don’t think I don’t recognize you!” Mike yelled as he punched him in the face.

To Dylan’s surprise, this punch didn’t hurt as much as before; it didn’t make him cry. He just turned his face to look at Mike leaning over him and lifted his arm towards Mike’s neck. In one fluid, swift motion, Dylan was holding Mike’s neck in a firm grip. He saw his face turn red slowly.

“Listen you son-of-a-bitch!” Dylan said with newfound confidence. “Don’t think you can hurt me any longer!”

Mike grabbed Dylan’s arm and pulled it away, laughing as he positioned his full weight on Dylan’s flat stomach; his kneecap poking in the abs. “I’m not scared of these mysterious new muscles you now have; as long as I have the weight advantage I can still beat the crap out of you!”

Even though Dylan tried to flex his abs as hard as possible, the full body weight of the fat bully was still too much to not hurt. His arm was held to the ground by Mike’s other leg, making it difficult to do anything.

Just then, a dark shadow eclipsed the two boys completely. As Mike noticed a grin in Dylan’s eyes, he quickly turned to see what was causing the shadow.

But before he could completely turnaround he felt a large hand grab the back of his neck, pushing his entire body flat out on the tiled floor. He face smashed into the marble as the force was too strong for him to stop it. He felt his hands being grabbed behind his back and firmly held into place as if he was a criminal getting caught by the police.

Mike saw Dylan getting up from the floor, looking with large eyes at the person who was holding him captive. Just then he heard a familiar voice warn him: “What are you going to do about a guy who has the muscles AND the weigh advantage?!?”

No, it can’t be. Mike tried to turn his head to look up at the mysterious guy holding him prisoner, but all he could see was a massive shirtless torso even more ripped and large than Dylan’s. His pecs were actively pumped from holding Mike down, blocking his view of the guy’s face.

“Oh my god, i-i-is that you, Jake?”

“Bingo!” Jake said, lowering his head into Mike’s vision. “Or you could also call me your ‘New Worse Nightmare!’”

Just then Mike felt his entire body being lifted up off the ground in one fluid motion, before getting slammed in the side of the machine. Mike’s nose almost broke from the last impact, causing it to bleed rapidly.

Jake turned his victim around to face him. “Aw, did that hurt?”

Mike could not believe what he was seeing. His entire field of vision was filled with muscles, all belonging to the same guy. Massive squared pecs, extremely broad shoulders, rippling abs and arms the size of cannons. Yet the familiar face of the small, skinny boy he was chasing was somehow attached to this incredible superhuman body.

“Hey, I asked you something!” Jake yelled while slapping Mike in the face.

“Y-y-yes, you are hurting me…” A tear started rolling down his cheek.

“Good!” Jake replied devilishly. Then he turned his head to look at Dylan and the salesman. “You guys have anything to add to that?”
1111111212.title: Jake's revenge

choices: Jake and Dylan follow Alexander, Louis and Rob
Jake and Dylan sneak off to try to get into the machine
111111122.content:
“Ouch” Dylan said as he fell back slightly after bumping against something hard. No wait, it wasn’t something hard as it moved as well. He blinked his eyes, adjusted his focus and took another look. To his surprise he was staring straight against the most perfectly build brick-wall made entirely out of human skin. “What the…” he questioned himself as he slowly panned up to see that it wasn’t a thing he bumped into, but a human being! The wall of pure muscle moved as the person was breathing in and out slowly. Dylan tilted his head further back, until he finally had eye contact with the face attached to the massive body.

“Hey there little buddy, are you OK? I didn’t mean to hurt you, but you suddenly came out of nowhere…” the dark, manly voice excused himself.

Dylan’s mouth fell wide open as the naked torso he bumped into belonged to the most ripped body builder he had ever seen in his life; and he hadn’t seen many in real life. “I-I’m so sorry…” he started to excuse as well. “I-I guess I didn’t see you either…”

The man chuckled. “It IS sort of hard NOT to see me…”

Dylan quickly averted his gaze down, sort of ashamed to look the big man in the eyes any longer.

“Dude! Are you OK?” Jake asked his buddy after witnessing what happened. Jake quickly glanced at the big man’s naked torso and then averted his eyes as well. They were both so impressed with his physique, and afraid he might not like being bumped into, that they didn’t even find it odd he wasn’t wearing any clothes besides over-stretched boxer briefs.

“Yeah, I’m fine…don’t think I broke anything…” Dylan assured his buddy.

“Good, now let’s get out of here before Mike sees us!”

But before the boys could turn around to leave, Jake felt a giant hand grab his shoulder. He felt his entire torso being twisted around by the force of the arm. As he turned his head around himself, he looked straight into the eyes of the big man Dylan just bumped into.

“Jake, dude! Why didn’t you say it was you!” the big man said joyful.

Jake didn’t understand why the big man knew him. As far as he knew there was no-one in his friend list or family this big.

“Dude! It’s me!”

He took another good look into the man’s bright blue eyes…until the pieces fell together.

“Oh my god! Alexander! Is that really you?!?”

“Bingo!” Alexander said as he kneeled down to give Jake a hug.

Dylan looked surprised at Jake. “You know him?”

“Yeah…I think I do…” Jake joked. “It’s Alexander, my nephew! It’s the son of my mother’s brother” Then he turned towards Alexander. “Man, what happened to YOU?!? Picked up weightlifting? Steroids? The last time I saw you, you were skinny as a twig!”

Alexander laughed as he rose back on his feet, flexing his arm to impress his little nephew. “This here…it’s a long story…let’s just keep it at that!”

“Honey! Are you coming, we want to go pick out some new clothes for our new sizes…” a dark girly voice yelled from several yards away.

Both Jake and Dylan looked at the direction the voice came from; what they saw blew their minds. There was this Amazonian woman at least a head taller than the rest of the crowd. Right behind her were four other giant teenagers; two guys and two girls.

“Oh my god, is that Cassandra?” Jake asked Alexander.

“Yep…that’s her all right!”

“But…but what happened?”

“Well, let’s just say that we sort of all had a growth spurt with the help of this machine over there…” Alexander told pointing towards the Big Mean Green Muscle Machine.

As both boys followed Alexander’s finger they saw a large machine in the middle of the atrium, surrounded by a large crowd. The machine was making a noise as steam escaped from special nozzles. A moment later, a loud bell filled the entire atrium as the door opened and a body builder sized Amazonian stepped out with long, muscular legs which easily reached 7 feet.

“Wow! That’s amazing!” Dylan let out as he inspected every inch of the hot woman escaping the machine.

“So you’re saying that everyone can get a body like yours by going in that machine over there?” Jake asked his massive cousin.

“Yep; that’s what we all did. And I’ve got to tell you: it feels amazing!”

“I bet!”

Just at that exact moment Dylan spots Mike at the other side of the atrium looking at the Amazonian woman as well. “Oh crap; there’s Mike…and I think he just found out about the machine…”

“Oh no, we can’t let him get into the machine…or else it will mean our death!” Jake replied.

“Who’s Mike?” Alexander asked, scanning the atrium.

“The fat guy over there, with those losers behind him…that is actually the reason why Dylan bumped into you; we were running from him…”

“What for?”

“Well, he sort of attacked us in the parking lot and Dylan managed to spit Mike in the face and give another guy a head bud!”

“He attacked you?” Alexander asked, getting a bit angry at this Mike. “Why did he attack you?”

“He wanted our money we saved for the PS3 game we came to check-out. He said his dad owned this mall, thus making us trespassing his property…”

Alexander straightened to his full 7ft6 height as he was getting more and more furious at Mike. “We’ll just see about that. Nobody attacks my cousin for such a dumb reason!”

Alexander went over to his giant friends. After convincing them, the three giants stormed over through the crowd towards Mike and his gang.
111111122.title: Alexander the bodyguard

choices: But before he can run away, he bumps into an old acquaintance
He runs away and Jake wonders where Dylan could be
1111111221.content:
As soon as Alexander and his two giant friends stormed through the crowded, which parted right in front of them as everybody oohed and awed at their impressive physiques, Jake and Dylan decide to follow them.

Jake looked up at the three enormous backs he saw in front of him; they were rippling with muscles all over. Each of the three guys was shirtless, as their clothes had torn away during their transformation, exposing their traps and lats in full view for everyone to see. Jake could only gasp.

Halfway down the atrium, not even near Mike and his gang, they passed the Mean Green Muscle Machine which had another customer aboard apparently. It hissed, smoked and flashed as it was molding the physique of one of the new volunteers. A gentleman wearing a neat suit sporting the same logo as was printed on the side of the machine, was counting a stack of bills reaching easily in a couple of hundred bucks.

Dylan, following the group from behind, was mesmerized by the machine at work and the three giants in front of him that were created by that piece of machinery. He hesitated for a short while, but finally decided to take a detour through the crowd towards the guy with the nice suit. Jake or any of the giant teens were so focused on Mike and his gang that they didn’t even notice Dylan taking a turn early.

Meanwhile, over on the other side of the atrium, Mike was still impressed with what he had just witnessed: the Amazonian girl that stepped out of the machine.

“Oh my god, that girl is smoking hot! What I wouldn’t do to bang her right on the spot…!” he yelled with his hand raised high, seeking for confirmation from his obedient friends. One of the guys high fived him.

“You would SO rule this place if you could get a girl like that!”

“I know! I bet ya she’s got the stamina to go on all night…much better than whining Brenda!”

“Uh guys, and Mike...I think we’ve got company!” another one of Mike’s friends warned them while pointing towards the three giant, muscled men approaching them.

Mike turned his head to the direction his friend pointed and saw a trio of overgrown, shirtless teenagers get closer and closer while staring right at him. “What the…?!?”

The last group of people stepped to the side as the teenagers who were more than a head taller than everyone around them arrived at were Mike was standing. The three men stood side-by-side, the largest in the middle. All three looked with a dirty eye towards Mike; the biggest guy of his group which was easily spotted.

“Are you the one that’s called ‘Mike’?” Alexander, the biggest, asked, emphasizing his name with a girly voice.

Mike gulped as he took his opponent in from top to bottom; the physique made him shiver, so he decided to try some humor. “That depends on who’s asking, the merry men in tights?”

Mike’s friends started laughing as Mike pointed towards the three boys’ boxer briefs, stretched to the max, which were the only pieces of fabric that could support their transformations.

Alexander took a step closer, leaving only less than a foot in between him and Mike. Mike’s friends immediately stopped laughing as they took a step back, scared. Mike was brave enough to stay where he was, now looking straight at Alexander’s impressive chest.

“We won’t be as merry as you might think, once we’re done with you, little man!” Alexander threatened.

Mike tilted his head up to look Alexander in the eyes. “Oooh, now I’m really scared….” he said with the same girly voice as Alexander did before.

Alexander launched his large arms over towards Mike and grabbed him firmly by his upper arms, squeezing tightly until it hurt. Mike’s friends wanted to intervene, but before they could do anything, Louis and Rob had grabbed them by their shirts.

“Listen, and listen very carefully, you punk! I was sent over by me sweet, innocent nephew…apparently you haven’t been all that nice to him just a moment ago! You hurt him, you teased him and you even took all his money…well, that’s something I can’t let you do anymore….”

Mike finally started to show some fear in his eyes as Alexander was still squeezing his upper arm.

“Y-your nephew? You mean…that son-of-a-bitch Dylan is your nephew?”

Alexander squeezed harder, raising his arms, lifting Mike several inches up in the air. “Nope! Guess again!”

“It’s me, you stupid moron!” Jake yelled towards Mike as he stepped out from behind his cousin. “And stop calling Dylan a son-of-a-bitch!”

Mike looked down at the skinny boy he was still chasing just moments ago; he looked full of confidence all of a sudden.

“You’re his cousin?!” Mike yelled towards Jake as the puzzle pieces started to fall into place.

Jake devilishly shook his head.

“And he told me everything you had done to him…Well, I can’t let that happen as you might understand. So we have to fix it in one way or another…” Alexander continued threatening the bully he was still holding suspended in the air. “First of all, I think it would only be fair if you paid him the PS3 game he is so desperate in getting. Oh, and make that two, as Dylan would like one as well…”

Hearing the name of his buddy finally made Jake aware he isn’t around; he mustn’t have followed them, he figures.

“Secondly; this mall is public terrain for everyone; whether you’re big or small, sweet or asshole, classmate or son of the owner…you don’t screw them over for your own amusement. And thirdly; from this day forward you’re going to be nice, and only be nice, to my nephew and his buddy, because if you only lay as much as one finger on either one of them I swear I will hunt you down and screw you over hard…it would be a miracle if you would be able to tell about it later!”

Mike, who started to have some serious bruises on his upper arm, swallowed deeply as he looked sheepishly into Alexander’s fearful eyes.

“Capice?” Alexander asked for a final sign of agreement.

Mike nodded.

The big hulking teenager slowly lowered Mike back on his feet.

“Now start with the money; you owe my nephew 126 dollars, if I’m correct.”

Alexander looked at Jake, who nodded.

“B-But I don’t have that kind of money on me right now…”

“Then make sure you’ll get it somehow!”

Mike looked around, thinking quickly on how to get 126 dollars, when he saw his friends held up by Louis and Rob. “Guys; can you help me out here…I need to borrow 126 dollars, what do you guys have?”

After several minutes of putting everyone’s money together, under the watchful eyes of the three hulking teens, Mike was able to give Jake the promised 126 dollars.

“That’s very nice of you, Mike!” Alexander said mockingly. “Now, for now there is only one thing left to do: beat it! Get the hell out of here and don’t show your face in my presence or Jake or Dylan’s ever again!”

Louis and Rob let go of Mike’s friends and they didn’t know how quickly they had to get out of there. Mike takes one final, evil, look at Jake before panning up towards Alexander. He lets out a fake smile and turns around to run, as fast as he can.
1111111221.title: Mike against the giants

choices: Jake also joins the club of giant teenagers
Another person steps out of the machine
11111112211.content:
As Mike turns around to get the hell away from the massive teen that had just lectured him about bullying, he bumps hard into something else that suddenly appeared behind him. It almost knocks him cold on the floor.

As he opens his eyes he is greeted by another set of ripped abs and a giant chest that he thought he had just said goodbye to. The wall of muscle, which obviously belongs to a human being, felt much harder than he thought was humanly possible. It moved as the person inhaled and exhaled.

Mike slowly panned up to see whose head belonged to this body. He figured it would be either one of the other two guys that held up his friends, but as he approached the face he got to scare of his life.

“Not so fast!” the person said in his deep, manly voice.

The face, and body, belonged to none other than mister Crapmypants: Dylan!

“D-Dylan?!?”

“The one and only; giving you the final gift you deserve!” the now massive Dylan said as he hunched forward and grabbed Mike’s waist with his arms crossed. As he lifted Mike up into the air, which went smoothly and without much effort, Mike felt Dylan’s now ripped and hard muscles squeeze into his own body. While he wondered what could have caused Dylan to hulk out all of a sudden, he noticed the entire mall turning upside down. Dylan had grabbed Mike in such a way that he was now holding his former bully upside down; his head facing the floor, his feet facing the ceiling.

“This is for ruining Jake and my lives all those years!” Dylan shouted as he suddenly lifted Mike’s body up in the air before launching it head-first straight into the tiled concrete of the atrium floor.

Mike’s body smacked flat-out on the floor, almost breaking his neck, paralyzing him from the neck down. Mike went unconscious for just a few seconds, before waking up on the cold tiles looking up at a giant teen with ripped clothes and enormously developed muscles. His entire body ached, though he was able to get up slowly.

“And NOW BEAT IT, ASSHOLE!” Dylan yelled into Mike’s ear as he helped him get up by yanking him off the ground. As soon as Mike was back up his feet, Dylan shoved him in the right direction: the exit. “And never show your face around us again!”

As the broken down bully exited the atrium, a sense of pride and accomplishment came over Dylan. A grin appeared on his face. He slowly turned around to face Alexander, Louis, Rob and his best buddy Jake; all of which were looking at him with their mouths agape.

“Oh My F*ing God!” Jake yelled as he finally saw the new body of his best friend in full size. Dylan’s new size easily rivaled that of Rob; almost getting close to Alexander’s. “What the HELL did you do?” Jake yelled from both excitement as well as amazement.

Dylan, pushing his shirtless chest out, smiled even wider. “Do you like it?”

“Like it? I fricking love it! I’m jealous as hell!”

Dylan laughed again. “I figured, what they can, I can do as well!” nodding towards the trio of giants males. The three teens laughed.

Jake ran towards his buddy and, without asking, started touching the shirtless hulked-out torso. It felt rock hard and super dry; there was absolutely no fat under the skin. Thick veins sprung up as Dylan moved his arms to show off his biceps. He smiled from ear to ear as he saw how impressed his best buddy was on his new physique.

“No way…this is seriously not happening!” Jake said to himself as he still couldn’t really believe it was his best friend in front of him. The transformation in his cousin was unbelievable enough, but he hadn’t seen his cousin in months. But his best friend was only his size minutes ago… “This is not real!”

“Oh it’s real alright!” Dylan answered by flexing his thighs and abs. Jake felt the same power in them as he touched it.

“H-How does it feel?” Jake asked curiously.

“It..it feels unbelievable! Really, like I’m dreaming! I feel like I can take on the entire world! Like I have the strength to stop a locomotive! Like I have energy for the entire week!”

“Looking massive, bro!” Alexander complimented by padding Dylan on his broad shoulder as he approached. Dylan smiled and shook Alexander’s hand; both their upper arms flexed from the grip in full view of the small Jake. “Thanks, ‘bro’!” Dylan joked, remarking the new nickname he received.

Jake rubbed his eyes. “This is fricking amazing! Look at you two! You’re massive! Bigger than any bodybuilder I have ever seen!”

“But I’m the biggest!” Alexander challenged.

“We’ll see about that!” Dylan laughed as he launched a wrestling attack against the giant teen.

A small crowd, which had gathered once the trio of giants was about to face Mike, still looked on in amazement as the two giant teenagers started wrestling each other in the open atrium of the mall.

After a short fight, it was Alexander who floored Dylan and one the match. “Best two out of three?!?” Dylan proposed as Alexander helped him up from the floor again.

“Still not convinced I’m stronger than you?” Alexander laughed.

“What do you think, Jake? Who’s stronger, him or me?” Dylan asked facing towards Jake. But as was expected, Jake was not there anymore.

Alexander looked at Dylan and sighed. “We could have known…”

Then both boys faced the Mean Green Muscle Machine which so happens to sound the bell…

1111111221122.title: Hermione Granger from Hogwarts

choices: Tyler is big, but Thomas is bigger
Thomas is big, but Tyler is bigger
1111112.content:
Meanwhile at the other side of the mall, the now huge Sharon was walking through the crowd with a cranky look on her face. She could now be one of the most ripped and build girls at school; she still wasn’t bigger than Louis or Cassandra. This bothered her. She couldn’t get back into the machine as she had already spent all the money she had on the first try. She decided to go home, find some more cash and come back later in the day to show Louis and the gang who owns this town.

Her one man stampede made her bump into a lot of insignificant people along the way. Two of those, however, were her next-door neighbors; Tyler and Thomas Johnson.

Deep in her thoughts of finding more money, Sharon did not even notice that she bumped into the two boys from the house next to her; she just continued going. Both boys were pushed out of the way, almost falling on the ground, as the she-hulk passed.

“Hey, watch where you’re going!” Tyler, the oldest with 15 years of age, yelled at her. She didn’t reply.

“Hey…wasn’t that Sharon?” Thomas, the 11-year-old asked his brother.

“What? From next-door? Have you ever seen her? That girl is fat, this girl was build like a house!”

“Still she looked a lot like her…”

“Whatever…just follow me, we only need to get you some new shoes from the other side of the mall. I can’t believe I let mom talk me into taking you along…”

“How can you buy me shoes if I can’t even try them on…?!?”

Tyler didn’t even respond as he rushed himself through the crowd. Thomas followed along.

Once the two boys reached the large atrium, they were both drawn to a huge line leading up to a strange looking machine. Next to the machine was a group of teenager, or at least their heads looked like teenagers; their bodies were something else.

“Wow, look at those kids!” Thomas said.

“Don’t be stupid…I don’t think they’re kids; they look like professional body builders or wrestlers…”

The boys stopped, intrigued by what was happening, as a small boy was entering the chamber of the machine. The operator, a nicely dressed man, typed in some numbers and the machine started working. Lights flickered and strange noises filled the atrium. Several seconds later, just as quickly, everything stopped. A loud bell, much like the one on a microwave, broke the silence as the door of the chamber started to open. Smoke came out, followed by a man as ripped as Arnold Schwarzenegger in his heydays.

Both Tyler and Thomas could not believe what they saw; the teenager who had entered the chamber was now huge and ripped to shreds.

“Oh my god!? Did you see that?!? He grew huge!” Thomas declared at his brother.

Tyler, the skeptical one, shrugged off that thought. “Nah, probably a magician or something; the guy must have switched with the bodybuilder…”

Thomas, looking at the machine again, could not see enough room for the bodybuilder to have hidden. “So where was he supposed to come from…a trapdoor in the floor?!?”

“I don’t know…” Tyler said as he started to grow tired of his little brother. “Why don’t we just go and get you your shoes…?”

Thomas on the other hand had other plans; he started to run towards the group of massive friends.

“THOMAS! NO!” Tyler said, but his little brother would not listen. There was nothing to do but to follow.

As Thomas neared the group of friends he started to slow down. From up close they were even bigger than he thought. The newly transformed guy flexed his arms in comparison to the other big guy; his was bigger. A girl, the smallest of the three, jumped up in the newly transformed guy’s arms and kissed him. That’s when Thomas also noticed one of the guys was still his normal size; he obviously had not yet used the machine.

As stubborn as he was, Thomas scraped his throat and asked his question. “Excuse me!”

Rob, the last grown man, looked down at the little boy and laughed. “Ah, look at him, he’s probably impressed with my body…”

“Oh yes sir, I sure am!”

He laughed even harder. “You don’t have to call me sir, just call me Rob. What’s your name?”

“Oh sorry si…uhm…Rob. My name is Thomas!”

“Hi Thomas!” Cassandra, the biggest of them all, said in a lovely voice. Then the rest welcomed him in unison.

“Wow…you’re all so…”

“…Big?!?” Louis, the other big guy, finished.

Thomas nodded. “How is that possible?!?”

“Thomas, let’s go…don’t bother these nice people!” Tyler said a bit scared of the towering teens as he has approached Thomas from behind.

“That’s OK, we don’t mind!”, Missie, one of the big girls, stated, “We were just about to explain how we got bigger. See the machine over there? It’s a magical machine; it can grow your muscles as big as you want!”

“See Tyler, it IS the machine! It’s not a magic trick!” Thomas yelled at his bigger brother.

Rob started to laugh. “This sure isn’t a magic trick…” he said as he lowered himself onto one knee in front of Thomas with his arm raised in a flexed position. The huge biceps, just inches away from Thomas’ face, radiated strength, power and heat. A pulsating vein across pumped fresh blood into the muscle. Thomas could not contain himself and grabbed the muscle with both hands. His mouth fell open as he touched the warm skin. He tried to squeeze but could not dent the muscle in any way…

“Wow Rob, this feels amazing!”

Tyler, as impressed and in awe with Rob’s arm as his little brother, asked as well to touch it.

“Sure, go ahead.” Rob said, still flexing his arm.

As Tyler felt Rob’s rock hard biceps he could only imagine himself with such a huge and ripped body.

“Wow, impressive sir, and this is all done by the machine?!?”

“Please, it’s Rob, and yes; only seconds in the machine and poof; you’re ripped!”

“Is it free?” Thomas asked spontaneously.

Cassandra laughed. “It used to be, for us…but now you have to pay some money. How much you pay depends on how big you will get.”

Thomas looked at Tyler. “How much money do we have?”

“100 dollars”, Tyler answered, “but that’s for new shoes…”

“I don’t care about the shoes…do you?”

Tyler looked at Rob’s physique stretching his shirt to the max and then back at his little brother. “Let’s grow!”

“Oh, but have you seen the line…?!?” Thomas suddenly noticed as he saw his plan fall through.

“Don’t worry, maybe we can arrange something with the salesman…” Cassandra, the biggest of them all, told the small boys. “Let’s go girls.”

The three girls went over to the salesman and had a hard bargain to make. After a while, they came back.

“You’re in luck; he is able to put you guys in the machine right now…but you’ll have to go together in one go.”

“But how will that affect our growth?” Tyler asked.

“We don’t know…” Missie replied. “We’ve only been in it one at a time…but we’ll soon find out!”

The two boys, accompanied by the huge teens, skipped the line and went straight to the machine. A large, beautiful Amazonian woman had just stepped out of the chamber. The boys paid the 100 dollars and stepped into the machine. The door closed, the lights flickered and several seconds later, a loud ping filled the atrium again.

The door opened with a hiss, smoke escaped, when the first of the boys stepped out.
1111112.title: Tyler and Thomas
