11111121.content:
The first one to step out of the smoking chamber was Tyler. He managed to wrestle himself through the door with ease. As he stepped out, his new height reached that of Missie; bigger than Becky the smallest of the girls, but still considerably smaller than the other guys or girls. Tyler’s body, however, was ripped beyond believe; he suddenly looked like a professional fitness model who could feature his perfect abs on every cover available.

As Tyler flexed his arm to found out how much he had grown, a nice baseball size biceps popped up. He was happy with new body, based off of his smile, but it soon disappeared as he saw his physique in comparison with the other guys.

“What the…hey, how come I’m still smaller than Rob and Louis…I’ve paid more, haven’t I?!” he asked the salesman.

“You have indeed paid more, but as you were in the chamber together with your brother, the machine has allocated a certain percentage for you and a certain percentage for your brother…”

“So, you mean, he’s even…”

Just at that moment, a large hand grabs the frame of the door, followed by a familiar head. Thomas sniffs up the fresh air as he feels much more energetic. His youthful face looks similar, but shows some impressive improvements. It looks more squared, more chiseled. His neck is something entirely different; it’s almost wider than his head. He pushes out his neck further, indicating what is about to come.

Tyler’s mouth falls open.

Thomas, having trouble fitting through the opening of the door, squiggles his torso through the small gap. His shoulders are wider than the width of the door so he has to twist his torso to fit through. His chest is incredibly pumped, two slabs of meat forming perfectly squared pectoral muscles. His nipples pointing downwards as they are pushed to the bottom of his pecs. They move up and down as Thomas frees himself from the chamber.

Right below his chest is a perfectly aligned set of abdominals; easily 8 can be spotted. On either side his obliques and lats flare out his torso to superhuman proportions. Following his eight-pack further down, Thomas is only sporting a small light blue posing trunk which looks stuffed beyond believe. Escaping from the trunks are the two largest thighs any person has ever seen. They touch each other, making it unable for Thomas for his knees to touch. Finally incredibly developed calves and large much larger feet support his new physique firmly on the ground.

As the new Thomas stands upright, his feet slightly apart, sniffing in the fresh air making his chest grow even larger, he looks around the atrium.

“Oh my God!”, his dark, booming voice, sounds, “You all look so small!”

Right in front of him the line of people waiting to try the machine themselves look at the muscle behemoth with open mouths. Then, one person starts to fight himself through the mass of people; he wants a body like that as well. Another person starts pushing as well. Before they know it; the entire line of people is fighting in front of the salesman for a spot in the machine; large sums of money are offered that make Thomas’ amount look like a tip.

Thomas himself however does not pay any attention on the fighting crowd in front of him. He instead looks down at his new body and starts inspecting it; feeling it all over. He flexes his thighs, his abs, his chest, his arms. Then he looks at the side; his big brother is standing in front of the huge teens with his mouth agape. He looks small, as if he hadn’t even been in the machine yet.

“Hey bro! You look small compared to me!” Thomas says as he approaches.

Tyler could only look up at his little brother who now towered over him. He was huge; he couldn’t believe what he was seeing. “Dude….how….why….?!?”

“What’s the matter?!? Cat got your tongue?”

“How….how is it possible; we both went in the machine at the same time….?!?”

“Yes, but as the salesman said, the machine allots a certain percentage to each individual in the machine; if you’re in the machine by yourself you’ll get 100%, but you probably got 20% and your brother 80%” Rob interrupted. Then he looked up at Thomas. “Looking good, little man!”

Thomas laughed. He was bigger in both size as well as height than Rob; the guy he was looking up to before. “Thanks!” He looked at the other teens and found out he was looking straight into the eyes of Cassandra; the biggest of them all.

“Hi hot stuff!” Cassandra joked.

“Oh my God, how big AM I?”

“You’re massive!” Alexander, the still little guy, the smallest of them all, said.

“We must be over 7 feet” Cassandra added.

“Oh my God! I can’t wait to tell mom and dad!” Thomas yelled excited. “No one is ever going to bug me again…!”

“Boy, you’re giving me a cramp in the neck…” Alexander joked from looking up all the time.

“Well sweety, why don’t you give it a try then as well?” Cassandra suggested.

“What? You think? I thought you didn’t want me to be bigger?!?”

Cassandra laughed. “That’s OK, I actually think it’s kind of hot…” she said looking at Thomas.

“Well, in that case…let’s give it a try!”

11113.content:
“Did you see that?” Louis said, amazed. “Now she’s so hot! I gotta get in there!”

The salesman held up his hand. “You have to wait your turn, young man. This lady is ahead of you too.". He turned around. "I’m sorry. What can I do for you ma’am?”

“It’s Mrs. McGrew, our next door neighbor!” Louis whispered. “The one who’s always yelling at me when my football goes in her flower garden!”

“She’s not bad looking, for a married woman. I’d almost call her a MILF!” Rob whispered back.

Louis shook his head. “You wouldn’t say that if you knew her. She hates kids and she’s as stuck up and mean as they come. What the hell is SHE going to do with muscles!”

Mrs. McGrew stood very straight, as tall as her 5’8” plus her 4” heels would allow, and looked down at the salesman. “I was an excellent athlete when I was in school”, she explained. “I played soccer, volleyball and softball. Unfortunately, gym classes don’t replace that exercise, and, you know, the years do take their toll.”

“Well, we all need a little help, now and then, ma’am, and I’m very happy to be the provider of all the help you can afford. How many units do you wish to purchase?”

“Hmmm, which credit cards do you take?”

“I’m very sorry, but we are a cash and carry business only, ma’am. You’ll carry away the muscles, and we’ll carry away your cash!” he joked.

She looked at him sternly. “That is a shame!” She fished around her Louis Vitton purse. “Well, here is $500. We’ll see whether THAT does the trick!”

“Well, it won’t hurt, ma’am, it sure won’t hurt!” he said, rubbing his hands together.

"$500! We don't have that kind of money!" Louis exclaimed.

"Sshhh!" said Rob. "If he knows that he might skip us again!"

Mrs. McGrew strode crisply into the chamber and shut the door firmly. Moments later there was a loud ding. The door flew open and she practically flew out, looking 25 years younger. She was less muscular than Cassandra but her body looked as solid as steel. Nothing wobbled, jiggled or shook. She still looked down on the salesman from the same height, but her height was now all her own; her high heels were crushed into flat soles. With each step she took, the ground shook slightly.

She turned toward the boys. "Why it's little Louie! Are you here to grow up and get a little muscle?" she asked condescendingly, leaning over him. She slipped her feet out of her shoes and perched on top of a bumpy area designed to prevent people sitting down along the path. She wiggled her toes and placed them on top of two of the bumps and crushed them into dust. "Unless you’re lucky enough to grow up as strong as I am, you had best be sure you don't let your balls find their way into MY garden," she warned and walked off.

"Shit! Shit! Shit!! What a ball-buster" Louis said.

"She's, like, super-powered now! "We just GOT to get our turn!" Rob said, looking beseechingly at the salesman.

111131.content:
The salesman nodded.

"Which of you is first?" he said.

"Me!" they each said.

"I was here first!" Rob said.

"Just because Becky carried you! I got here by myself!"

"Who cares? If you'd flown here like Superman I'd still be first."

The salesman looked skywards in exasperation and turned away.

"Can I help you?" he said to a man and woman, who approached him hesitantly. Both were thin, wore glasses, hand-woven sweaters and blue jeans and held ecologically friendly burlap bags to carry their purchases of books and sensible natural fiber clothing instead of the usual assortment of store-supplied plastic.

"W-why yes," the man said, swallowing. "We feel, we would like, um, er ...."

"Mervyn! Tell him. We agreed you would talk."

"I know, Breah. But you know I don't like speaking to salesmen," he said, quietly.

"Now, now, I don't bite!" the salesman said. "You're here because you want some muscle, right? And this is the Big Mean Green Muscle Machine, so you've come to the right place, right?"

"It's important that it's green," the man said. The woman nodded vigorously. "We're very committed Green Party members. This won't harm the environment, will it?"

"Not in the slightest!"

"Do you have an ISO 14000 certificate?" the woman asked. "What is your carbon footprint? What is your power consumption?"

The salesman was looking flustered but then said. "We don't CONSUME power. We MAKE power. Isn't that why you're here? To increase your power?"

They looked at each other, swallowed and then nodded. “Power, er, to the people,” the man said, firmly, but quietly.

Mervyn handed over two worn $20 bills and they stepped inside. Very soon there were two loud dings and the door opened. Mervyn stepped out standing straighter, with a somewhat fuller chest, somewhat thicker arms and wearing more stylish glasses, a brighter and more tightly woven sweater and a somewhat more confident expression. Breah followed, her thin frame completely transformed. Her large breasts pushed her bright green sweater out, her thick arms filled the loose sleeves. Her glasses were gone, her long straight hair was now short and stylish. She pulled Mervyn's hand up and shouted, "Green Power!" and flexed a formidable muscle. "Yeah! Green Power Rules!!” she shouted as she felt how solid it was. She turned to Mervyn, looked him up and down and felt his bicep. Her smile grew larger (and his smaller) when she easily compressed it, to his dismay. "Yeah, and this is even better, even MORE progressive. GURLZ RULE!!!" Mervyn started to say something to the salesman but the woman stepped between them.

Breah and Meryn run into another "progressive" couple
1111311.content:
"We're finished here, Mervyn," she said firmly, her hand on his shoulder. "Time to go." She pushed him to the side and he didn't have the strength to resist her enhanced power. Very quickly they were several yards away from the machine.

"But Breah, Breah! Stop. Hey!" he protested to no avail. He decided to try rational argument. "Look, when we entered, I was stronger than you were. I paid $40 out of our joint account and the increase in our strength should have been either an equal amount of an equal percentage increase, leaving me still stronger than you. Obviously the machine malfunctioned. We paid the required fee, and should have enjoyed proper results. You must agree that this is an injustice that should be corrected, and if not we should report the company to the regulatory authorities and shut it down."

"No, Mervyn. I don't agree at all, because you have misunderstand the situation entirely." She breathed deeply, enjoying the way the further expansion in his chest so easily distracted Mervyn from interrupting her to resume his argument. "You're assuming that justice in this case is simply the perpetuation of existing power structures. I am incredibly disappointed that you would adopt a counter-revolutionary approach! Clearly this machine has been programmed to further a progressivist agenda. How can you you be so selfish that you failed to see the significance of an event where the female has been recognized as the member of an oppressed class and has been empowered!" Breah flexed her sizable biceps for emphasis and tightened her grip on Mervyn's shoulder.

Mervyn looked confused. "But ... I have always treated you as an equal. I thought we were equal."

“What can I do for you, young lady?”

“Did you just give my little brother all that muscle?” a thin girl asked, looking very concerned. She fingered a thick silver medallion that she wore around her neck.

“I don’t know. Who’s your brother?”

The girl pointed at Rob’s broad back as he walked around the machine and approached Becky.

“Well, the Big Mean Green Muscle Machine did,” he replied.

She shook her head. “That was a really bad idea.” She looked down at her own arms. “A really bad idea. I mean, he is my brother and I do love him. But he can be a real jerk, you know?”

“It’s not my place, of course, to say,” he replied.

“Still, you can do something about it,” she suggested.

“Yeah, if you pay,” he replied. “After all, it’s your turn.”

“$300.”

“$300?! That was MY money. I mean, he was supposed to use it to pick up the new IPOD for me! That jerk!” She reached into her wallet and took out six hundred dollar bills. “I had saved this for a new dress, but I don’t have a choice, do I?”

“I’m sure you won’t find a better place for your money than right here!” the salesman said excitedly.

The girl glared at Rob, who was showing his new muscles off to Becky. She practically threw the money at the salesman and stepped into the machine. “Give me all you got!” she said, closing the door.

The salesman watched Becky wrap her arms around Rob. He pretended to wipe the sweat off his brow, mouthed the words ‘just in time’, and started the machine. Seconds later, with a loud ding, the girl stepped out. Although she had not grown any taller, she was no longer thin. Every inch of her body was covered with solid muscle, and she moved with a fluid grace that spoke of unlimited power and fierce determination.

“Just wait until I get a hold of him!” she said. “This will be the last time he misuses MY money!” Her fingers drifted absently to her medallion and she played with it, twisting it as though it were soft putty.

The salesman stepped backwards. “I’m, er, sure you’re right,” he said, busying himself with his paperwork until she walked away.

It was just like the old days, even better, Miss Colson thought, as she walked energetically through the mall, wishing she had more money to reshape her wardrobe as quickly as the Big Mean Green Muscle Machine had reshaped her body.

She was, unfortunately, of two minds about how to dress. On the one hand, the conservative, loose-fitting blouses in her closet would be a complete waste of her new figure. On the other hand, she still was a teacher, a role model for her students, and as a new teacher without tenure, she needed to project the right image to the school board.

Then there were the practical problems. She wasn't sure her bulging upper arms would fit into the sleeves of any of her blouses. And what if she did manage to squeeze them in? She was sure that if she involuntarily flexed a muscle in class it would burst the fabric and tear right through! She didn't mind the size of her biceps. Quite the contrary, as they would probably quiet the boys' discussions of her bra size, which she could help overhearing! But any ripping of her clothing would be a distraction in class and make it harder to do her job and get rehired next year. The students would be talking about it for weeks, probably hoping for a repeat performance.

While she was thinking all this through and considering the clothing displayed in shop windows she was hardly seeing anything else around her, including the attention she was drawing from a certain colleague, John Good, a history teacher she had been secretly admiring since she started work a few months earlier. They had spoken a few times in the faculty lounge but despite his being single and living alone in town, he had failed to respond to the subtle hints she had dropped about the movies she liked. In fact, he had yet even to initiate a conversation with her. But if she had been her usually perceptive self, she would have noticed that he had been following her for the last twenty minutes, ducking in and out of doorways, looking for vantage points on the floor above to look down her spandex top, and catching her reflection through mirrored shop displays. Now he was acting more boldly, following right behind her, and when she turned suddenly to go back to a shop she bumped right into him, sending the slightly built history teacher sprawling.

"Oh! I'm so ... John! Let me help you!" she said, bending over and pulling him to his feet effortlessly. "I didn't see you!"

John gasped at the strong grip she had on his arm and his jaw dropped at the strength she exhibited in lifting him back to his feet.

"S-Sally! Is that you? What a ... surprise to see you!" He looked up at her, as he had formerly been two inches taller than she and was now three inches shorter. "And, um, looking so, um, fit!" he said, blushing.

Sally blushed too. "Yes, I, um, have, er, started working out again." She cleared her throat. "A little."

John was eying her short sleeves, unable not to notice the stress her thick arms were putting on them. How had he not noticed before what an impressive physique she had. "I should, er, probably get the address of your gym, then," he said, and laughed nervously, unable to take his eyes off her arms.

Sally blushed more deeply. She didn't actually belong to a gym. "Yes, well ...."

"If you don't want to tell me ...." he said awkwardly, glancing up at her eyes and then back down at her arms. "I mean, some people like their, er, privacy, of course, when they ...."

Sally realized suddenly that he liked her. This was her opportunity to do something about it.

14.content:
Chloe was watching the whole scene unfold with great interest. She'd almost been the first to try the muscle machine, but the trio of high school girls had beaten her to it. But look at them! She eagerly wanted a body like Becky, Missy or, even better Cassandra! Or more! After all, they were high school girls, and now they were giant amazons. What more could this machine to do her, a junior at college! And then maybe people would listen to her when she told them that you could be healthy and strong on a vegetarian diet.

Chloe was, of course, anything but healthy and strong. While a vegetarian can certainly get enough protein to be very athletic, they have to work at it, carefully ensuring that they eat a lot of beans or other high protein non-animal food. Chloe's diet consisted primarily of sprouts, organic fair trade coffee and smug self-satisfaction. That wasn't good for anyone.

As a result, Chloe was short, thin and really quite unhealthy looking. She was quite a bit skinnier than even Becky had been before her transformation, with no curves, and even less muscle. She had a pale yellow complexion, and dry, straw-like hair that was starting to thin quite badly. Her nails too were cracking and sometimes her cuticles even bled. She wore a pair of green combat pants and a black t-shirt that read "Love animals, don't eat them"

As soon as Becky, Missy and Cassandra left the booth, Chloe stepped up.

"Step right up, young lady." shouted the impresario. "Would you like to be the next to try the big mean green muscle machine? You saw what it did for those three, imagine what it can do for you!"

"Yes yes," Chloe responded curtly. "But first, were any animals harmed in making this machine?"

"No ma'am, the BMGMM is 100% made from post consumer recycled goods, as well as a chunk of meteor rock we found in the Arizona dessert." The last sentence was delivered as an almost sub-audible whisper.

"Oh good, I'll try it then." Since it was still under the machine's free trial period, she merely stepped inside. The salesman hit the big button, the machine hummed and then dinged and moments later Chloe stepped out of the machine.

Looking exactly the same as before.

She looked down over her body with a look of abject disappointment.

"Hey, Mister! What gives, you turned those other three into muscle-bound goddesses, and nothing happened to me!"

The salesman quickly swung out a white baton and hit the sign in front of the machine, right where it said "Results may vary, Satisfaction not guaranteed" and hustled Chloe out from the front of the machine, not wanting her negative results to impact his sales.

As she left she heard him call out to the crowd, "The machine does need to have something to start with, after all. I think maybe the young lady should go have a steak dinner and come back!" The crowd laughed and Chloe fumed.

She pulled out her phone and called her boyfriend Nathan. Nathan was also a junior at college, the head of the vegetarian alliance and local membership coordinator for PETA. He was even more of a vegetarian crusader than Chloe was. He was also an underground guerrilla animal rights crusader who would break in to labs or ranches to free animals from their lives of cruelty.

"Nate, you will not believe what just happened at the mall! Yeah, the mall! Yeah yeah, I needed to get a new pair of Birkenstocks, sue me. Anyways, I'm just so mad! I can't talk on the phone, meet me at..."

The salesman may have been taunting her, but she was hungry. Really really hungry.

"Meet me at Sprouts, that place in the food court. Yeah. Five minutes, OK."

She walked to the food court and ordered a big salad at Sprouts. She found a table and devoured it quickly before her boyfriend even got there. It did nothing to curb her hunger, if anything she was hungrier than before. And craving... such cravings. For what? The thought of a giant thick rare steak popped into her head. Oh gross! That was so disgusting, what made her think of that? Eww. So thick and red and juicy and...

Yuck! She needed to clear her mind. She got up and went over to the smoothie place. A large thick strawberry smoothie always filled her up. She ordered an extra large.

"Would you like to add a whey protein booster to that for only a dollar?" Asked the girl behind the counter cheerfully.

No, whey came from milk and milk was cruel and wrong.

"Yes," she found herself responding. "Make it two."

What was wrong with her? Oh well, nevermind, it was already done. She may as well drink it. She walked back to her table slowly, and the smoothie was gone before she reached it. An extra large smoothie should have left her feeling bloated and full, but she was still starving. The more she ate, the hungrier she got.

She saw Nathan across the food court and waved at him. Nathan was the kind of vegetarian who paid attention to his nutrition. He was thin, but healthy, with long lithe muscles of a rock climber. He got in line at Sprouts and Chloe joined him.

"Hey babe, you eaten yet?"

"Err no, I was waiting for you," she lied.

"Great, let's get something here and you can tell me all about whatever set you off, OK?"

Nathan ordered two giant bean burritos in sprouted grain whole wheat tortillas. To his surprise, so did Chloe.

"Wow Chloe, I'm impressed! You're getting more protein, good for you! Don't you find beans disgusting, though?"

She didn't respond, she just tried to keep her mind of how hungry she was as she walked quickly to their table, with Nathan in tow. He'd barely unwrapped his burrito before she had finished both of hers. Quietly, without saying a thing she reached over to grab his second one and devoured that too.

"Chloe, slow down! Wow getting mad must really give you an appetite! Chloe? Chloe! Where are you going?"

She didn't respond, she was lost in her hunger now, pretty much out of control. Nathan watched as she walked over to the roast beef sandwich shop, lost in her cravings for food. She looked different somehow, he couldn't put his finger on it.

She got there and walked around behind the counter. When the pimply young cashier tried to stop her she shoved him, sending his sprawling backwards on the linoleum floor and she walked into the walk-in fridge. The door closed behind her with a dull thud.

Nathan, realizing that something wasn't normal here, got up and ran across the food court to the roast beef shop. He found the young cashier, Chris according to his name tag, just getting up, still woozy from being knocked down by Chloe. For a little thing she was strong! They both walked up to the walk-in fridge and tried to open it, but the door wouldn't budge. Nathan knocked on the door and yelled in, "Chloe!" but she made no response. The only sound was the dull humming of the cooling cycle.

"That door shouldn't lock! She must be jamming it or something from the inside."

"Why would she do that?" asked Nathan. "She must be stuck in there somehow. There's got to be some way to force this open, she could suffocate!"

He was cut off by a titanic pounding sound as the entire walk-in refrigerator door shook. They only had a second to get out of the way before a second impact, this one stronger than the first tore the door from it's hinges and sent it flying across the shop. Nathan and Chris carefully peered around the corner into the freezer trying to see through the fog from the cold air. The fog soon dissipated, and they could see inside. Pretty much everything that could be consumed by a human was gone. Meat, cheese, vegetables, even a 40 gallon drum of mayonnaise it was all gone. Packaging was strewn around the room. And in the middle of it all was Chloe.

She was at least a foot taller than she had been when this all started, easily topping Nathan's six feet. Her formerly baggy green combat pants had been shredded by her gigantic muscular legs. She reached down and casually tore the scraps of tough fabric that still dangled from them, leaving her with a pair of very, very short cutoffs that hugged all the curves of her muscular bottom.
